name: Tomato Salad With Turkish Tahini Dressing
description: If tomatoes are unavailable, use this popular Turkish dressing with steamed vegetables or a green salad.
recipeYield: Serves four to six (the recipe makes about 2/3 cup dressing)
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, halal, healthy, kosher, low cholesterol, low-sodium, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, summer, tahini, tomato
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds tomatoes, or a mixture of red and green tomatoes, cored and sliced
1/2 teaspoon cumin seeds, lightly toasted and ground
Freshly ground pepper or Aleppo pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange the sliced tomatoes on a platter.

Mix together the tahini, water and lemon juice. Combine the garlic with 1/4 teaspoon salt in a mortar and pestle, and mash to a paste. Stir into the tahini mixture. Add the cumin, then salt and pepper (or Aleppo pepper) to taste. Thin out with water if the dressing is too thick to pour. Drizzle over the sliced tomatoes, sprinkle on the parsley and serve.
